name: Niha Nur Fadiya
greetingText: 3 words that I like it & I dedicate this song to you
wishText: wish you all the best & ilysm <3
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I'm sorry I can't give you something on your special day and I'm also sorry for my bad treatment of you
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
